main event: On December 14, 1956, an observer in Washington Heights, NYC, reported seeing an exceptionally bright light, about the size of a basketball, hovering above the Hudson River.
interesting points: The object was hovering motionless with a faint tinge of green,It was noted to be at an elevation of approximately 500-600 feet,The object appeared at 11:15 p.m. and disappeared after about 4 to 5 seconds,There was no noise or sound associated with the sighting,No other reports were made regarding the object.
sighted object: a bright light hovering over the Hudson River
location: Washington Heights, New York City, USA
